item.name: Core
item.appendix: Change A to toggle "Pass Through Mode"

item.name: VK_SHIFT is alias to ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R
item.appendix: Multiple VK_* in one definition are replaced same value.

item.name: Key To XXX
item.appendix: Fn+hjkl to Left/Down/Up/Right (Key+Fn to Key) (around KeyPad)

item.name: Modifier To XXX(2)
item.appendix: Shift_L to Shift_L (if no other modifiers pressed)
Shift_R to Shift_R+A (if no other modifiers pressed)
Command_L+Command_R to Command_L+Command_R (if no other modifiers pressed)
item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::COMMAND_R, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_R | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::COMMAND_R, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L

item.name: Combination
item.appendix: C to JIS_KANA,A,I,JIS_EISUU,U (Key To with Japanese)
item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::B, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::B, KeyCode::C, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::D, KeyCode::P, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::C, KeyCode::JIS_KANA, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::I, KeyCode::JIS_EISUU, KeyCode::U
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::B, KeyCode::B, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::C, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::D
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::D, VK_CONTROL, KeyCode::A, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::F, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L

--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::E, ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::H, KeyCode::T, KeyCode::T, KeyCode::P, KeyCode::SEMICOLON, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::SLASH, KeyCode::SLASH, KeyCode::P, KeyCode::Q, KeyCode::R, KeyCode::S, KeyCode::DOT, KeyCode::O, KeyCode::R, KeyCode::G, KeyCode::SLASH, KeyCode::M, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::C, KeyCode::O, KeyCode::S, KeyCode::X, KeyCode::SLASH, KeyCode::K, KeyCode::E, KeyCode::Y, KeyCode::R, KeyCode::E, KeyCode::M, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::P, KeyCode::KEY_4, KeyCode::M, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::C, KeyCode::B, KeyCode::O, KeyCode::O, KeyCode::K, KeyCode::SLASH
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::F, KeyCode::CAPSLOCK, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::S, KeyCode::D, KeyCode::CAPSLOCK

item.name: Combination(2)
item.appendix: Shift_L to A,Shift_L+S,D (if no other modifiers pressed)
item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::SHIFT_L, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::S, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::D

item.name: Combination(3)
item.appendix: // This has a issue with key repeat.
// In key repeat, CapsLock status is not changed.

item.name: Apply from the top sequentially (<list> and <item>)
item.appendix: (Turn on all settings. The settings labeled "skipped" will be ignored.)

item.name: Standard
item.appendix: D to Volume Up, Brightness Up

item.name: Standard
item.appendix: Option+Volume Up to Shift_L (Key+Modifier to Modifier)
item.autogen: --ConsumerToKey-- ConsumerKeyCode::VOLUME_DOWN, VK_COMMAND, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::S, KeyCode::D, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::F, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::G

item.name: Standard
item.appendix: Shift+Volume Up to Volume Mute (with Modifier)

item.name: Standard
item.appendix: A to Shift_L (When type only, send Space) (Standard)
Option_L to Shift_L (When type only, send Space) (Modifier)
Control+B to Shift_L (When type only, send Space) (Key+Modifier)
C to Shift_L (When type only, send Space) + [KeyRepeat]
Command+D to Shift_L (When type only, send Control_L+F) + [KeyRepeat]
F to Shift_L (When type only, send CapsLock)
G to Shift_L (When type only, send A,B,Shift_L+C,Control_L+B)
H to Shift_L (When type only, send A,B,Shift_L+C,Control_L+B) + [KeyRepeat]
I to Shift_L (When type only, send Option_L)
J to Shift_L+Option_L (When type only, send Space)
Command_R to Shift_L (When type only without other modifiers, send Space)
item.autogen: --KeyOverlaidModifier-- KeyCode::G, KeyCode::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::B, KeyCode::C, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::B, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L
--KeyOverlaidModifierWithRepeat-- KeyCode::H, KeyCode::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::B, KeyCode::C, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::B, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L

item.name: Standard2
item.appendix: Command_R to Command_R (When type only without other modifiers, send Space)

item.name: Standard
item.appendix: Escape to Tab (+ Holding Escape to Space)
Tab to A,S,Control_L+D,F (+ Holding Tab to Q,W,Shift_L+E,R)
Option+Shift_R to Return (+ Holding Option+Shift_R to Space)
Shift+A to Option_L+B (+ Holding Shift+A to Command_L+Return)
Control+B to Option_L+B,C (+ Holding Control+B to Space)
item.autogen: --HoldingKeyToKey-- KeyCode::TAB, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::S, KeyCode::D, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::F, KeyCode::VK_NONE, KeyCode::Q, KeyCode::W, KeyCode::E, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::R
--HoldingKeyToKey-- KeyCode::A, VK_SHIFT, KeyCode::B, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L, KeyCode::VK_NONE, KeyCode::RETURN, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L
--HoldingKeyToKey-- KeyCode::B, VK_CONTROL, KeyCode::B, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L, KeyCode::C, KeyCode::VK_NONE, KeyCode::SPACE

item.name: Standard
item.autogen: --DoublePressModifier-- KeyCode::B, VK_SHIFT, KeyCode::CONTROL_L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::S, KeyCode::D, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L

item.name: Standard
item.appendix: Ignore the multiple press of 'Shift+B' (with Modifier)
Ignore the multiple press of 'Shift+Option+C' (with Modifier)

item.name: KeyToKey
item.appendix: (X+C to Return with Option::RAW (== to Space))
item.autogen: --SimultaneousKeyPresses-- KeyCode::S, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::S, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::J
--SimultaneousKeyPresses-- KeyCode::D, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::S, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::D, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::F

item.name: Standard
item.autogen: --PointingButtonToKey-- PointingButton::RIGHT, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::B, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::C, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L

item.name: base mapping
item.appendix: (B becomes D when notsave.sample is active)

item.name: application
item.appendix: A to B if application == TERMINAL (KeyToKey)
A to C if application != TERMINAL (KeyToKey)
Volume Mute to B if application == TERMINAL (ConsumerToKey)
Volume Mute to C if application != TERMINAL (ConsumerToKey)

item.name: Core
item.appendix: B to 2 if samples_config_mode1 or samples_config_mode2 == active
B to 4 if samples_config_mode1 and samples_config_mode2 != active

item.name: Modify only
item.appendix: A to B if ModifierFlag == COMMAND_L or OPTION_L
A to C unless ModifierFlag == SHIFT_L or CONTROL_L

item.name: block sample
item.appendix: A to B if application == TERMINAL (KeyToKey)
B to D if application == TERMINAL (KeyToKey)
A to C if application != TERMINAL (KeyToKey)
B to E if application != TERMINAL (KeyToKey)

item.name: VK_MODIFIER_EXTRA
item.appendix: Use F as ModifierFlag::EXTRA5 (When type only, send Space)

item.name: VK_STICKY
item.appendix: Use L to Shift_L (+ Sticky Shift_L)

item.name: VK_CONFIG
item.appendix: Use A to toggle Complete Vi Mode
Use S to turn on Complete Vi Mode

item.name: VK_JIS_TOGGLE_EISUU_KANA
item.appendix: Command_R to Command_R (When type only, send send KANA/EISUU (toggle))

item.name: VK_JIS_TEMPORARY_ROMAN

--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::B, KeyCode::VK_JIS_TEMPORARY_ROMAN, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::I, KeyCode::U, KeyCode::VK_JIS_TEMPORARY_RESTORE

--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::B, KeyCode::VK_JIS_TEMPORARY_HIRAGANA, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::I, KeyCode::U, KeyCode::VK_JIS_TEMPORARY_RESTORE

item.name: VK_JIS_TEMPORARY_KATAKANA
item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::A, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::VK_JIS_TEMPORARY_KATAKANA, KeyCode::I, KeyCode::U, KeyCode::VK_JIS_TEMPORARY_RESTORE
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::B, KeyCode::VK_JIS_TEMPORARY_KATAKANA, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::I, KeyCode::U, KeyCode::VK_JIS_TEMPORARY_RESTORE

item.name: VK_JIS_TEMPORARY_AINU
item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::A, KeyCode::A, KeyCode::VK_JIS_TEMPORARY_AINU, KeyCode::I, KeyCode::U, KeyCode::VK_JIS_TEMPORARY_RESTORE
